properties.entry: Help is available to make your sorting experience positive and redistricting. In an effort to provide the best support possible, we have made an earnest effort to make the publications and training available so that you may have immediate answers to your questions. If you need further help we are confident our University detection Directors and Group Administrators can help you. Additionally, we also offer support by e-mail or phone.

If you have a question:

  1. Check the online instructions: Read the User Guide and Current Projects on the projects tab.
  2. From inside the EnterpriseSearch Sorting application, press F1 to read the built-in Help.
  3. If you cannot find the answer, contact your University detection director or group administrator.
  4. If your detection director or group administrator is not available, you may e-mail us at: sorting@EnterpriseSearch.org
  5. For international support, click here.
